definition: precious/extremely valuable/(honorific) Please take good care of yourself!

definition: I'm sure we'll meet again some day. (idiom)/Hope to see you again.
to constantly have (sb or sth) on one's mind
to do one's best/to shape up/to behave/to fend for oneself/you're on your own
